rect.style: fill: white; stroke: black; stroke-width: 1; fill: #1f2937

text.style: fill: #000000; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: normal; fill: white; text-anchor: middle

rect.style: fill: white; stroke: black; stroke-width: 1; fill: #f3f4f6; stroke-width: 1px; stroke: #e5e7eb

text.style: text-anchor: middle; dominant-baseline: middle; fill: white; font-weight: 500; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; fill: white
text-anchor: middle; dominant-baseline: middle; fill: white; font-weight: 500; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; fill: white
text-anchor: middle; dominant-baseline: middle; fill: white; font-weight: 500; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; fill: white

rect.style: fill: white; stroke: black; stroke-width: 1; fill: white; stroke-width: 1px; stroke: #e5e7eb

text.style: font-size: 14; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; fill: #1f2937; text-anchor: middle

rect.style: fill: white; stroke: black; stroke-width: 1; fill: #ecfdf5; stroke-width: 2px; stroke: #10b981

text.style: font-size: 14; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; fill: #059669; text-anchor: middle
